whyWork.title: Why Work at the Ministry of Health?
whyWork.subtitle: Join a team dedicated to transforming healthcare across Sierra Leone
whyWork.card1Text: Access to continuous training programs, workshops, and opportunities for career advancement within the health sector.
whyWork.card2Text: Competitive salary packages, health insurance coverage, and retirement plans for you and your family.
whyWork.card3Text: Directly contribute to improving healthcare outcomes for millions of Sierra Leoneans across all 16 districts.
whyWork.card4Text: Work alongside dedicated professionals, international partners, and leading health organizations like WHO and UNICEF.

jobAlerts.privacy: We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe anytime.
